Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.
